subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Hotels and Travel Lodgings
Mobile Homes and Trailers
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Dave Brailsford, the head of Team Sky, has raised the prospect of a future without hotel stays at the race, but the U.C.I. has other ideas, citing fairness.
snippet: Dave Brailsford, the head of Team Sky, has raised the prospect of a future without hotel stays at the race, but the U.C.I. has other ideas, citing fairness.
